definitions.definition: Having a small width; not wide ; having opposite edges or sides that are close , especially by comparison to length or depth .
Of little extent; very limited; circumscribed .
Having a small margin or degree.
examples: The Republicans won by a narrow majority.

definitions.definition: Scrutinizing in detail; close; accurate; exact.
Formed (as a vowel) by a close position of some part of the tongue in relation to the palate; or (according to Bell) by a tense condition of the pharynx; distinguished from wide .
Of or supporting only those text characters that can fit into the traditional 8-bit representation .

main_definition: Having a small width; not wide ; having opposite edges or sides that are close , especially by comparison to length or depth .
secondary_definitions: Of little extent; very limited; circumscribed .
( figuratively ) Restrictive ; without flexibility or latitude .
Having a small margin or degree.
( dated ) Limited as to means; straitened
Scrutinizing in detail; close; accurate; exact.
( phonetics ) Formed (as a vowel) by a close position of some part of the tongue in relation to the palate; or (according to Bell) by a tense condition of the pharynx; distinguished from wide .
( computing ) Of or supporting only those text characters that can fit into the traditional 8-bit representation .
